backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling contact inquiries and user profiles with access control, including public inquiry submission and admin/user-restricted queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature requirements, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files including layout, components, pages, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions and light/dark mode color tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, Services, About, and Contact using SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactDeta: Displays contact info fetched from the backend with fallback defaults for email, phone, and website.
frontend/src/components/site/CoverageSec: Shows Europe-wide and international coverage details with icons and explanatory text.
Three-step visual process for pickup, shipping through an international network, and delivery.
frontend/src/components/site/MarketingCa: Reusable card component for marketing items with icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Wrapper providing consistent spacing and container width for page sections.
frontend/src/components/site/ServicesPre: Displays three featured services with icons and descriptions plus a link to the full Services page.
Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, services, contact info, and a dynamic year plus a referral link.
Provides a responsive site header with logo, navigation links, and a mobile menu using a Sheet component.
Defines the main page layout including header, footer, and routed content via Outlet.
Displays a grid of marketing value proposition cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook managing identity state, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Provides a mutation for submitting inquiries to the backend with basic validation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base plus custom theme variables and utility classes, including light/dark styles and hero background effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company overview, mission, values, and an image using multiple Section components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and contact details layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, value propositions, services preview, and a call-to-action.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a services overview with a grid of service cards, a process explanation, and extra shipping info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata for building the KK Euro Express website, including schema version, architectural notes, and a list of defined features. It outlines required pages, branding, and content guidelines for the multi-page site.
